title: We’ve just passed 500 signatures!
description:
We just passed 500 signatures on our petition to end the monetisation of Youtube channels focused on targeted harassment.

I’ve recently learned that one of the content creators has now released a video targeting me and this petition — so now, more than ever, I need your help. 

Will you help me again by sharing this with ten other people?

We need to do what we can to stop incentivising harassment on social media —  Here's a link to share https://chng.it/hSs5jwzsvK
